scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:pages
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint -w klondike-mvp -- --fix && npm run lint -w freecell-mvp -- --fix && npm run lint -w dog-care-tracker -- --fix && npm run lint -w pet-care -- --fix && npm run lint -w light-vod-editor -- --fix
scripts.typecheck: tsc --noEmit -p klondike-mvp/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p freecell-mvp/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p dog-care-tracker/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p pet-care/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p light-vod-editor/tsconfig.json
scripts.validate: npm run format:check && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm test && npm run build
scripts.setup-hooks: ln -sf ../../scripts/pre-commit.sh .git/hooks/pre-commit && ln -sf ../../scripts/pre-push.sh .git/hooks/pre-push && chmod +x .git/hooks/pre-commit && chmod +x .git/hooks/pre-push && echo 'âœ… Git hooks installed (pre-commit + pre-push)!'
